00031 #include "lbann/data_readers/lbann_data_reader.hpp"
00032 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_dataset.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace lbann
00035 {
00036   class io_layer : public Layer {
00037   public:
00038     io_layer(lbann_comm* comm, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers, std::vector<regularizer*> regs={}, bool data_sets_span_models=true);
00039     //    io_layer(lbann_comm* comm, uint mini_batch_size, DataReader* training_data_reader);
00040     void setup_data_readers(int base_offset, int stride, int model_offset = 0);
00041     DataReader *select_data_reader();
00042     DataReader *set_training_data_reader(DataReader *data_reader);
00043     DataReader *set_validation_data_reader(DataReader *data_reader);
00044     DataReader *set_testing_data_reader(DataReader *data_reader);
00045     long update_num_samples_processed(long num_samples);
00046 
00047     long get_num_samples_trained() { return m_training_dataset.num_samples_processed; }
00048     long get_num_samples_tested() { return m_testing_dataset.num_samples_processed; }
00049     long get_total_num_training_samples() { return m_training_dataset.total_samples; }
00050     long get_total_num_testing_samples() { return m_testing_dataset.total_samples; }
00051 
00052     long get_linearized_data_size();
00053     long get_linearized_label_size();
00054 
00055   public:
00056     dataset m_training_dataset;
00057     dataset m_testing_dataset;
00058     dataset m_validation_dataset;
00059     bool m_data_sets_span_models;
00060   };
00061 }
